resources.string: View the Legal Notices in a browser window
View the Privacy Notice in a browser window
View the team behind New World: Aeternum in a browser window
View the Terms of Use in a browser window
Set whether to invert the mouse's vertical axis on Camera inputs
Set whether to invert the controller's vertical axis on Camera inputs
Set the general horizontal speed of the camera
Set the general vertical speed of the camera
Multiplier (in percent) of horizontal camera speed while aiming down sights
Multiplier (in percent) of vertical camera speed while aiming down sights
Multiplier (in percent) of horizontal camera speed while operating a turret
Multiplier (in percent) of vertical camera speed while operating a turret
Set the size of the deadzone for the left stick
Set the size of the deadzone for the right stick
Set the turn speed when the stick reaches the edge of motion
Set whether to enable aim assist for projectile-based attacks
Set the amount of friction applied while aiming ranged weapons near a target
Set the movement speed of the virtual cursor
Virtual cursor fades out while hovering over interactive UI elements
Set whether to vibrate the controller while hovering over interactive UI elements
Set the multiplier applied to the deadzone settings while using the virtual cursor
Set whether to enable hover assist for small interactive UI elements
Set the virtual cursor magnetism range
Set the virtual cursor magnetic force strength
Stronger magnetic force when the virtual cursor is near the center of the screen
Virtual cursor magnetic force is linear
Set whether the virtual cursor slows down while hovering over interactive UI elements
Set how much the virtual cursor slows down while hovering over interactive UI elements
Set the speed the map moves while panning
Set the speed the map moves while zooming
Set whether to display your FPS
Set whether to limit the frame rate to the monitor refresh setting (enable to reduce screen tearing)
Set whether to enable motion blur
Set the quality of effects, particles, and volumetric effects
Set the quality of lighting, not including shadows
Set the quality of post processing
Set the quality of shadows, not including lighting
Set whether to display effects from other players' emotes
Set whether to favor performance or quality
Set whether to use resolution scaling
Set the resolution scaling quality level
Set the font size in chat
Set the number of seconds new messages are visible before fading away
Set the chat message background opacity
Set whether to close the chat after sending a message
Set whether to display the time of the chat message
Set whether to display alerts while chat is closed
Set the chat message to the channel color
Set whether to hide large banners for incoming Friend, Group, and Company invitations (Trade and Duel invitation banners remain visible)
Set whether to enable the automatic rejection of the different notification and invite types below
Set whether to block friend invites and notifications
Set whether to block group invites and notifications
Set whether to block company invites and notifications
Set whether to block trade invites and notifications
Set whether to block duel invites and notifications
Set whether to block direct messages and notifications
Set whether to block coin transfers and notifications
Set whether to block musical performance invites and notifications
Set the volume of your microphone
Set the sensitivity of your microphone
Set the voice chat input mode
Set the quality of visuals (lower values use less system resources)
Boosts frame rates by using AI to render additional frames (requires a GeForce RTX 40-series or higher graphics card and Hardware-accelerated GPU Scheduling enabled in Windows settings)
Reduces PC latency and increases responsiveness
This setting(s) change will apply the next time the game starts up
Take a short survey to provide feedback when you exit the game
Set the volume of sound effects
Set the volume of ambient effects
Set the target lock indicator volume
Set the volume of the music
Set the volume of the ambient music
Set the volume of UI sound effects
Set whether to force softer sounds to play at higher volume
Set the audio quality (lower values use less system resources)
Set the maximum rendered frames per second (FPS)
Visit the New World: Aeternum support website to find out how to change the audio language

string.comment: Use the language set on the platform's OS.

resources.string: Set whether to filter bad words from the chat
Set whether to display subtitles for dialog
Set the size of subtitle text
Set the color of subtitle text
Set whether to display a black outline or drop shadow around subtitle text
Set whether to display the speaker's name in subtitles
Set the color of speaker's name
Set the opacity of subtitle backing
Auto-select the first option in conversations
Set whether to display a notification when an achievement is unlocked
Set whether to display notifications related to Territory control
Set whether to display notifications related to Influence, and War/Invasion scheduling and management
Set whether to display notifications related to Housing
Set whether to display a notification when a Perfect Salvage occurs
Set whether to connect to Twitch to enable Twitch features
Set whether to enable other players to see that you are streaming on Twitch (only works while streaming)
Set whether to hide other players' Streamer Spotlight status while you are streaming and have Streamer Spotlight enabled
Set whether to enable you to join streamers or recruit your subscribers and followers on Twitch into your group or company
Set the size of Nameplates and Interact hints
Set the size of in-game Quest Helper pins
Set the opacity of in-game Quest Helper pins
Set whether to automatically zoom in the Map when opening it in a Settlement or Outpost
Set whether camera shake is enabled, which may be disorienting for some players
Set whether to turn the character towards the movement input direction
Set whether to turn the character towards the movement input direction
Set whether to zoom the camera out when looking down, and zoom in when looking up
Amount of smoothing to perform of vertical camera movement
Camera will slowly rotate to be directly behind player when moving.
Set whether to display the reticle even when your weapon is sheathed
Set whether to activate Aim and Block by tapping their inputs instead of hold
Set whether to enable team color tinting for allies in game modes
Set whether to enable team color tinting for enemies in game modes
Set the default color of the reticle
Set the reticle color while aiming at an enemy
Set whether PvP XP is displayed
Set whether to display the social actions hint while looking at a nearby player
Restore these options to their default settings
Are you sure you want to restore these options to their default settings?
Set whether to mute the music performed by other players
Set whether to mute combat music
Set the music volume played by local and remote players performing musical instruments
Set whether the audio output is 360 degree audio panning for home theater and 180 degree audio panning for headphones
Set whether Text-to-Speech for incoming chat messages is enabled
Set the speed of text-to-speech messages
Set the volume of text-to-speech messages
Set whether to add indicators to enemy player's persistent area of effect visual effects
Set whether to enable controller modifiers by tapping their inputs
Set whether controller vibrations are enabled
Set the intensity of controller vibrations
Set whether to aim melee attacks using camera direction instead of input/character direction
Set whether to display the numerical value for stamina and mana
Set whether to fade HUD elements in and out depending on the situation
Set whether to display all weapon slots on the HUD
Set the bandwidth mode when receiving data from the server (low values may affect quality)

Set whether to send certain client telemetry data relating to your play experience and settings to the New World: Aeternum team (if you are experiencing network issues while playing, changing this setting to Off may help)
Set whether to display your character name leaderboards and enable leaderboard rewards
Set whether to enable the targeted healing system
Set whether to enable the targeting system on allies for healing
Set whether the camera follows the locked target
Set whether to enable target lock changing with camera aim (only enabled if Camera Follows Locked Target is set to On)
Set whether to enable maintaining target after performing heals
Lock camera to target when healing
Set whether to enable camera target locking when starting a Life Staff healing ability
Swap Enemy and Ally Target Lock input with Life Staff
Set whether to swap bindings for ally and enemy target lock while using the Life Staff
Set whether to cycle only through group or raid members while targeting with a Life Staff (this option is disabled if Raid Targeting via Hotkeys (Keyboard & Mouse) is set to On)

Set whether to limit targetable allies to members of your immediate group while Group Mode is set to On (this option is disabled if Raid Targeting via Groups and Hotkeys is set to On in 'Keyboard & Mouse')
Set whether to cycle through raid groups with Cycle Target Up/Down key bindings and target raid members with Targets Group Member key bindings
Set whether to display hotkey hints for each member of the currently selected group while Raid Targeting via Groups and Hotkeys is enabled
Set whether to enable targeting system on enemies
Set the speed at which the camera moves to a different target
Set whether to automatically switch to the next target after the first target is eliminated (only switches if the new target is targeting you)
Set whether to automatically disable target lock after holding its input for some duration
Auto-Disable Target Lock on Hold Duration
Set the amount of time in tenths of a second required to hold the target lock input if Auto-Disable Target Lock on Hold is on
Toggles Smartcast on or off. Smartcast allows you to use supported aimed abilities with a single button input instead of requring one input to aim and one input to cast.
Set whether smartcast triggers on release or activation of the ability button.
Open Key Bindings and bind all of the Life Staff Combat's Target Group Member inputs to enable this feature.
Set whether to enable narration assistance for getting into the game
Proximity voice chat disabled. Your account is too young or locked.
New World: Aeternum supports game entry narration assistance (English only) for players with low or no vision. You can turn this feature On or Off at any time in the settings.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now on. Press {toggleGENA} to turn off. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now on. Press Triangle to turn off. Press Square to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now on. Press Y to turn off. Press X to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now off. Press {toggleGENA} to turn on. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now off. Press Triangle to turn on. Press Square to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance is now off. Press Y to turn on. Press X to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance. Press {toggleGENA} to turn off. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance. Press Triangle to turn off. Press Square to continue.
Game Entry Narration Assistance. Press Y to turn off. Press X to continue.
Photosensitive Seizure Warning. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing New World: Aeternum. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue.
Photosensitive Seizure Warning. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing New World: Aeternum. Press Square to continue.
Photosensitive Seizure Warning. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing New World: Aeternum. Press X to continue.
Code of Conduct. You agree to protect the community, play fair, and to respect each other. Press {frontEndContinue} to accept.
Code of Conduct. You agree to protect the community, play fair, and to respect each other. Press Square to accept.
Code of Conduct. You agree to protect the community, play fair, and to respect each other. Press X to accept.
New World: Aeternum Title Screen. Press any button to continue.
New World: Aeternum Title Screen. Press any button to continue.
New World: Aeternum Title Screen. Press any button to continue.
Events screen. Press Circle to exit.
Events screen. Press B to exit.
News and Events screen. Press {ui_cancel} to exit.
News and Events screen. Press Circle to exit.
News and Events screen. Press B to exit.
Logging in. Please Wait. Press {ui_cancel} to cancel.
Logging in. Please Wait. Press Circle to cancel.
Logging in. Please Wait. Press B to cancel.
Leave Queue. Are you sure you want to leave the queue? Press {ui_cancel} for no. Press {frontEndContinue} for yes
Leave Queue. Are you sure you want to leave the queue? Press Circle for no. Press Square for yes
Leave Queue. Are you sure you want to leave the queue? Press B for no. Press X for yes
Select Character Screen. Press {frontEndContinue} to select {characterName}.
Select Character Screen. Press Square to select {characterName}.
Select Character Screen. Press X to select {characterName}.
Select Character Screen. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue.
Select Character Screen. Press Square to continue.
Select Character Screen. Press X to continue.
Select World Screen. Press {frontEndContinue} to select {world} in {worldset}. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Select World Screen. Press Square to select {world} in {worldset}. Press Circle to go back.
Select World Screen. Press X to select {world} in {worldset}. Press B to go back.
Entering {world} in {worldset}. Press {frontEndContinue} to create character. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Entering {world} in {worldset}. Press Square to create character. Press Circle to go back.
Entering {world} in {worldset}. Press X to create character. Press B to go back.
{warning}. Press {frontEndContinue} to accept. Press {ui_cancel} to choose a different world.
{warning}. Press Square to accept. Press Circle to choose a different world.
{warning}. Press X to accept. Press B to choose a different world.
Basic Settings. Press Square to continue.
Basic Settings. Press X to continue.
Brightness Settings. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Brightness Settings. Press Square to continue. Press Circle to go back.
Brightness Settings. Press X to continue. Press B to go back.
Intro Cutscene. Hold Cross, to skip.
Intro Cutscene. Hold A, to skip.
Character background. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Character archetypes. Press Square to continue. Press Circle to go back.
Character archetypes. Press X to continue. Press B to go back.
Character appearance. Press {frontEndContinue} to continue. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Character appearance. Press Square to continue. Press Circle to go back.
Character appearance. Press X to continue. Press B to go back.
Character name. Please type a character name. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Character name. Please type a character name. Press Circle to go back.
Character name. Please type a character name. Press B to go back.
Press {frontEndContinue} to continue with your character named {characterName}. Press {ui_cancel} to go back.
Press Square to continue with your character named {characterName}. Press Circle to go back.
Press X to continue with your character named {characterName}. Press B to go back.
The tutorial does not provide narration assistance. Would you like to skip tutorial?
Upcoming World Merge Notification. You have one or more characters in worlds that will be merged soon. Press {ui_cancel} to close.
Upcoming World Merge Notification. You have one or more characters in worlds that will be merged soon. Press Circle to close.
Upcoming World Merge Notification. You have one or more characters in worlds that will be merged soon. Press B to close.
World Merged Notification. You have one or more characters that have been moved as the result of a world merge. Press {ui_cancel} to close.
World Merged Notification. You have one or more characters that have been moved as the result of a world merge. Press Circle to close.
World Merged Notification. You have one or more characters that have been moved as the result of a world merge. Press B to close.

For text chat with other players, press {toggleChatComponent} to open chat. Type message then press {toggleChatComponent} to send chat. For proximity voice chat with other players, press and hold {toggleMicrophone} while speaking.

For text chat with other players, press the Left Button to open chat. Type message then press Square to send chat. For proximity voice chat with other players, press and hold the Left Button while speaking.

For text chat with other players, press Left on the Directional Pad to open chat. Type message then press X to send chat. For proximity voice chat with other players, press and hold Left on the Directional Pad while speaking.
{title}. {message} Press {ui_cancel} for No. Press {frontEndContinue} for Yes.
{title}. {message} Press Circle for No. Press Square for Yes.
{title}. {message} Press B for No. Press X for Yes.
{title}. {message} Press {frontEndContinue} to confirm. Press {ui_cancel} to cancel.
{title}. {message} Press Square to confirm. Press Circle to cancel.
{title}. {message} Press X to confirm. Press B to cancel.
Character Rename. You are required to rename {characterName}. Enter your new name. Press {ui_cancel} to cancel.
Character Rename. You are required to rename {characterName}. Enter your new name. Press Circle to cancel.
Character Rename. You are required to rename {characterName}. Enter your new name. Press B to cancel.

You are about to rebind:
<font color={color} face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{actionRemap} </font>

Press Button(s) to Bind:

is already bound to another action if you accept this bind the other\n action will be cleared.\n<font color={color} face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Are you sure you want to bind this action? </font>

This can be changed from the Main Menu.\nIf the setting cannot be changed, enable Cross-Play through your console setting first. Characters created on one setting will not be available when the setting is changed. Toggle Cross-Play again to play on these characters.
Toggle this feature to enable or disable communication with players on other platforms.
This option can only be accessed when communications are enabled through your console.\nToggle this feature to enable or disable text and voice chat with players on other platforms.
Are you sure you want to enable cross-play?\nThis will return you to the Main Menu
Are you sure you want to disable cross-play?\nThis will return you to the Main Menu
Resets all tutorials, allowing you to see tutorials you have already seen before
Are you sure you want to reset all of the tutorials?
